sentence: Sherwin-Williams Company ( SHW ) will begin trading ex-dividend on November 16, 2017.
A cash dividend payment of $0.85 per share is scheduled to be paid on December 08, 2017.
Shareholders who purchased SHW prior to the ex-dividend date are eligible for the cash dividend payment.
This marks the 4th quarter that SHW has paid the same dividend.
At the current stock price of $389.13, the dividend yield is .87%.
The previous trading day's last sale of SHW was $389.13, representing a -2.28% decrease from the 52 week high of $398.22 and a 49.67% increase over the 52 week low of $260.
SHW is a part of the Consumer Services sector, which includes companies such as Home Depot, Inc. ( HD ) and Lowe's Companies, Inc. ( LOW ).
SHW's current earnings per share, an indicator of a company's profitability, is $11.37.
Zacks Investment Research reports SHW's forecasted earnings growth in 2017 as 20.82%, compared to an industry average of 18.2%.
For more information on the declaration, record and payment dates, visit the SHW Dividend History page.
Our Dividend Calendar has the full list of stocks that have an ex-dividend today.
